566:1: atha khalu śakrasya devānāmindrasyaitadabhūt-pūrvajinakṛtādhikārāste kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraśca bhaviṣyanti bahubuddhāvaropitakuśalamūlāḥ,
566:4: kaḥ punarvādo ya enāmevaṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāmudgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti pravartayiṣyanti deśayiṣyantyupadekṣyantyuddekṣyanti svādhyāsyanti|
566:5: udgṛhya dhārayitvā vācayitvā paryavāpya pravartya deśayitvopadiśyoddiśya svādhyāyya tathatvāya śikṣiṣyante,
566:8: na te avaramātrakeṇa kuśalamūlena samanvāgatā bhaviṣyanti|
566:10: paripṛṣṭāḥ paripraśnīkṛtāśca te buddhā bhagavanto bhaviṣyanti kulaputraiḥ kuladuhitṛbhiścaināmeva prajñāpāramitām|
566:13: śrutvā codgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti pravartayiṣyanti deśayiṣyantyupadekṣyantyuddekṣyanti svādhyāsyanti,
566:18: ya etasyāmeva gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ deśyamānāyāmupadiśyamānāyāmuddiśyamānāyāṃ svādhyāyyamānāyāṃ nāvaleṣyante na saṃleṣyante,
566:23: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputraḥ śakrasya devānāmindrasya imamevaṃrūpaṃ caitasaiva cetaḥparivitarkamājñāya bhagavantametadavocat-yo bhagavan ihaivaṃ gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ deśyamānāyāmupadiśyamānāyāṃ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā abhiśraddadhadavakalpayannadhimucya prasannacitto bodhāya cittamutpādya enāṃ prajñāpāramitāmudgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati pravartayiṣyati deśayiṣyatyupadekṣatyuddekṣyati svādhyāsyati,
566:30: na hi bhagavan parīttakuśalamūlenāparipṛcchakajātīyena aśrutvā buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ saṃmukhībhāvataḥ pūrvamacaritavatā ihaiveyamevaṃ gambhīrā prajñāpāramitā adhimoktuṃ śakyā|
566:32: pūrvāntato'pi bhagavaṃstaiḥ kulaputraiḥ kuladuhitṛbhiśceyaṃ gambhīrā prajñāpāramitā bhāṣyamāṇā pratikṣiptā|
566:35: na hi bhagavan acaritavadbhiḥ pūrvāntata iyaṃ gambhīrā prajñāpāramitā śakyā adhimoktum|
566:36: ye'pi ca pratikṣepsyanti enāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣyamāṇām,
566:37: te'pyevaṃ veditavyāḥ-pūrvāntato'pyebhiriyaṃ gambhīrā prajñāpāramitā bhāṣyamāṇā pratikṣiptā|
566:38: tathā hyeṣāmasyāṃ gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ nāsti śraddhāḥ,
566:39: nāsti kṣāntirnāsti rucirnāsti cchando nāsti vīryaṃ nāstyapramādo nāstyadhimuktiḥ,
566:40: na caibhiḥ pūrvaṃ buddhā bhagavanto buddhaśrāvakā vā paripṛṣṭāḥ,
566:42: atha khalu śakro devānāmindra āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputrametadavocat-gambhīrā ārya śāriputra prajñāpāramitā|
566:43: kimatrāścaryaṃ syādyadasyāṃ gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ pūrvamacaritāvī bodhisattvo mahāsattvo nādhimucyeta?
566:44: atha khalu śakro devānāmindro bhagavantametadavocat-namaskaromi bhagavan prajñāpāramitāyai|
566:48: sarvajñajñānasya sa kauśika namaskāraṃ karoti yaḥ prajñāpāramitāyai namaskāraṃ karoti|
566:50: atonirjātā hi kauśika buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ sarvajñatā|
566:56: atha khalu śakro devānāmindro bhagavantametadavocat-kathaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthito bhavati?
566:58: evamukte bhagavān śakraṃ devānāmindrametadavocat-sādhu sādhu kauśika|
566:59: sādhu khalu punastvaṃ kauśika yastvaṃ tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhamenamarthaṃ paripraṣṭavyaṃ paripraśnīkartavyaṃ manyase|
566:61: iha kauśika bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran rūpe na tiṣṭhati,
566:63: yataḥ kauśika bodhisattvo mahāsattvo rūpe na tiṣṭhati,
566:69: yataḥ kauśika bodhisattvo mahāsattvo vijñāne na tiṣṭhati,
566:81: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantametadavocat-gambhīrā bhagavan prajñāpāramitā|
566:87: yataḥ śāriputra rūpaṃ gambhīramiti na tiṣṭhati,
566:91: yataḥ śāriputra vijñānaṃ gambhīramiti na tiṣṭhati,
566:94: yataḥ śāriputra rūpaṃ gambhīramiti na yogamāpadyate,
566:98: yataḥ śāriputra vijñānaṃ gambhīramiti na yogamāpadyate,
566:100: evamukte āyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantametadavocat-gambhīrā bhagavan prajñāpāramitā avinivartanīyasya vyākṛtasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya purato bhāṣitavyā|
566:103: na vicikitsiṣyati na dhaṃdhāyiṣyati na vivadiṣyati||
566:104: atha khalu śakro devānāmindra āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputrametadavocat-sacetpunarārya śāriputra avyākṛtasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya purata iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā bhāṣyeta,
566:106: evamukte āyuṣmān śāriputraḥ śakraṃ devānāmindrametadavocat-dūrataḥ sa kauśika bodhisattvo mahāsattva āgato veditavyaḥ|
566:107: cirayānasaṃprasthitaḥ paripakvakuśalamūlaḥ sa kauśika bodhisattvo mahāsattvo veditavyaḥ,
566:108: yo'vyākṛta imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ lapsyate darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya śravaṇāya|
566:109: śrutvā ca notrasiṣyati na saṃtrasiṣyati na saṃtrāsamāpatsyate|
566:110: na cedānīmasau cireṇa vyākaraṇaṃ pratilapsyate'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ|
566:112: sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvo naikaṃ vā dvau vā trīn vā tathāgatānarhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhānatikramiṣyati,
566:120: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantametadavocat-dūrataḥ sa bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattva āgato bhaviṣyati|
566:122: paripakvakuśalamūlo hi bhagavan sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvo veditavyaḥ,
566:123: ya imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ lapsyate darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya śravaṇāya|
566:124: kaḥ punarvādo'tra yaḥ śrutvā codgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati pravartayiṣyati deśayiṣyatyupadekṣyatyuddekṣyati svādhyāsyati||
566:126: dūrataḥ sa śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattva āgato veditavyaḥ|
566:128: paripakvakuśalamūlo hi sa śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhaviṣyati,
566:129: ya imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ lapsyate darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya śravaṇāya|
566:130: kaḥ punarvādo'tra yaḥ śrutvā codgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati pravartayiṣyati deśayiṣyatyupadekṣyatyuddekṣyati svādhyāsyati||
566:131: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantametadavocat-pratibhāti me bhagavan,
566:133: tadyathāpi nāma bhagavan yo'yaṃ bodhisattvayānikaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā svapnāntaragato'pi bodhimaṇḍe niṣīdet,
566:136: evameva bhagavan yaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ lapsyate darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya śravaṇāya,
566:137: kaḥ punarvādaḥ śrutvā codgrahītuṃ dhārayituṃ vācayituṃ paryavāptuṃ pravartayituṃ deśayituṃ upadeṣṭuṃ uddeṣṭuṃ svādhyāpanāya|
566:140: vyākariṣyantyenaṃ buddhā bhagavanto bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvamanuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodherabhisaṃbodhāyeti|
566:141: cirayānasaṃprasthitaḥ paripakvakuśalamūlo hi sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvo veditavyaḥ,
566:143: kaḥ punarvādo'tra bhagavan yaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā enāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāmudgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati pravartayiṣyati deśayiṣyatyupadekṣyatyuddekṣyati svādhyāsyati|
566:145: bhūyastvena hi bhagavan dharmavyasanasaṃvartanīyaiḥ sattvāḥ karmopacayairavihitāḥ,
566:146: teṣāṃ bhūyastvena asyāṃ gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ cittāni pratikūlāni bhaviṣyanti,
566:148: na hyanupacitakuśalamūlāḥ sattvā asyāṃ bhūyastvena bhūtakoṭyāṃ praskandanti prasīdanti|
566:149: upacitakuśalamūlāḥ khalu punaste bhagavan sūpacitakuśalamūlāḥ kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraśca veditavyāḥ,
566:151: tadyathāpi nāma bhagavan puruṣo yojanaśatikādaṭavīkāntārād dviyojanaśatikādvā triyojanaśatikādvā caturyojanaśatikādvā pañcayojanaśatikādvā daśayojanaśatikādvā aṭavīkāntārānniṣkrāmet|
566:152: sa niṣkramya paśyetpūrvanimittāni gopālakān vā paśupālakān vā sīmā vā ārāmasaṃpado vā vanasaṃpado vā,
566:154: yairnimittairgrāmo vā nagaraṃ vā nigamo va sūcyeta|
566:155: tasya tāni pūrvanimittāni dṛṣṭaivaṃ bhavati-yathemāni pūrvanimittāni dṛśyante,
566:156: tathā āsanno me grāmo vā nagaraṃ vā nigamo vā iti|
566:159: evameva bhagavan yasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyeyaṃ gambhīrā prajñāpāramitā upavartate,
566:162: nāpi tenotrasitavyaṃ na saṃtrasitavyaṃ na bhetavyaṃ śrāvakabhūmervā pratyekabuddhabhūmervā|
566:164: tathā hi asyemāni pūrvanimittāni saṃdṛśyante yadutemāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ labhate darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya śravaṇāya|
566:168: evamukte āyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantametadavocat-tadyathāpi nāma bhagavan iha kaścideva puruṣo mahāsamudraṃ draṣṭukāmo bhavet|
566:170: yathā yathā ca sa gacchenmahāsamudraṃ darśanāya,
566:171: tathā tathā sacetpaśyetstambaṃ vā stambanimittaṃ vā parvataṃ vā parvatanimittaṃ vā,
566:172: tenaivaṃ veditavyaṃ dūre tāvadito mahāsamudra iti|
566:173: sacenna bhūyaḥ paśyetstambaṃ vā stambanimittaṃ vā parvataṃ vā parvatanimittaṃ vā,
566:177: na mahāsamudrasyābhyantare kaścitstambo vā stambanimittaṃ vā parvato vā parvatanimittaṃ veti|
566:178: kiṃcāpi sa na mahāsamudraṃ sākṣātpaśyati cakṣuṣā,
566:179: atha ca punaḥ sa niṣṭhāṃ gacchati-abhyāsanno'smi mahāsamudrasya,
566:181: evameva bhagavan bodhisattvena mahāsattvenemāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ śṛṇvatā veditavyam-kiṃcāpyahaṃ taistathāgatairarhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhairna saṃmukhaṃ vyākṛtaḥ,
566:184: tathā hyenāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ labhate darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya śravaṇāyeti|
566:185: tadyathāpi nāma bhagavan vasante pratyupasthite śīrṇaparṇapalāśeṣu nānāvṛkṣeṣu nānāpallavāḥ prādurbhavanti|
566:186: pallaveṣu prādurbhūteṣvāttamanaskā bhavanti jāmbūdvīpakā manuṣyāḥ tāni pūrvanimittāni vaneṣu dṛṣṭvā nacirādvanapuṣpāṇi ca phalāni ca prādurbhaviṣyanti|
566:188: tathā hi imāni pūrvanimittāni stambeṣu dṛśyanta iti|
566:189: evameva bhagavan yadā bodhisattvo mahāsattvo labhate imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya śravaṇāya,
566:191: tadā paripakvakuśalaḥ sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvo veditavyaḥ-tenaiva pūrvakeṇa kuśalamūlenopanāmiteyaṃ tasmai gambhīrā prajñāpāramitā|
566:193: tāḥ pramuditā bhavanti prītisaumanasyajātāḥ-paurvakāṇāmapi bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāmimānyeva pūrvanimittānyabhūvannanuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodhervyākaraṇāya|
566:194: nacireṇa batāyaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo vyākaraṇaṃ pratilapsyate'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheriti|
566:195: tadyathāpi nāma bhagavan strī gurviṇī gurugarbhā|
566:206: paurvakeṇāyoniśomanasikāreṇāsevitena niṣevitena bhāvitena bahulīkṛtena imāmevaṃrūpāṃ kāyena vedanāṃ pratyanubhavāmīti,
566:208: tathā nacireṇa bateyaṃ strī prasoṣyate iti|
566:209: evameva bhagavan yadā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyeyaṃ gambhīrā prajñāpāramitā upavartate darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya śravaṇāya,
566:212: tadā veditavyamidaṃ bhagavan-nacireṇa batāyaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo vyākaraṇaṃ pratilapsyate'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheriti||
566:215: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat-āścaryaṃ bhagavan yāvatsuparigṛhītāśca suparīttāśca suparīnditāśca ime bodhisattvā mahāsattvāstathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena|
566:216: bhagavānāha-tathā hi te subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā bahujanahitāya pratipannā bahujanasukhāya lokānukampāyai mahato janakāyasyārthāya hitāya sukhāya devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca|
566:219: subhūtirāha-iha bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ kathaṃ prajñāpāramitābhāvanā paripūriṃ gacchati?
566:220: bhagavānāha-yadi subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na rūpasya vṛddhiṃ samanupaśyati,
566:222: evaṃ na vedanāyā na saṃjñāyā na saṃskārāṇām|
566:227: evaṃ na vedanāyā na saṃjñāyā na saṃskārāṇām|
566:244: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantametadavocat-ko'tra bhagavan adhimokṣayiṣyati evaṃgambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyām?
566:245: bhagavānāha-yaḥ śāriputra caritāvī bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhaviṣyati prajñāpāramitāyām,
566:247: āyuṣmān śāriputra āha-kathaṃ bhagavan caritāvī bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhaviṣyati,
566:249: bhagavānāha-iha śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo balāni na kalpayati,
566:258: evaṃ caritāvī śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na kvaciccarati,
566:262: atha khalu āyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat-gambhīrā bhagavan prajñāpāramitā|
566:265: āścaryaṃ bhagavan syādyadenāṃ prajñāpāramitāmudgṛhṇatāṃ dhārayatāṃ vācayatāṃ paryavāpnuvatāṃ pravartayatāṃ deśayatāmupadiśatāmuddiśatāṃ svādhyāyatāṃ likhatāṃ ca kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṝṇāṃ ca bahavo'ntarāyā utpadyeran|
566:267: bahavaḥ subhūte antarāyā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmudgṛhṇatāṃ dhārayatāṃ vācayatāṃ paryavāpnuvatāṃ pravartayatāṃ deśayatāmupadiśatāmuddiśatāṃ svādhyāyatāṃ likhatāṃ ca kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṝṇāṃ ca bhaviṣyati|
566:269: tathā hi subhūte imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmudgṛhṇatāṃ dhārayatāṃ vācayatāṃ paryavāpnuvatāṃ pravartayatāṃ deśayatāmupadiśatāmuddiśatāṃ svādhyāyatāṃ likhatāṃ ca kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṝṇāṃ ca māraḥ pāpīyānautsukyamāpatsyate'ntarāyaṃ kartum|
566:270: tatra śīghraṃ likhatā sacenmāsena vā māsadvayena vā māsatrayeṇa vā likhyeta,
566:273: tathāpi likhitavyaiva khalu punaḥ subhūte bhavati tena kulaputreṇa kuladuhitrā vā iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā|
566:275: evaṃ hyetatsubhūte bhavati yanmahāratnānāṃ bahavo'ntarāyā utpadyante||
566:276: evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat-iha bhagavan prajñāpāramitāyāmudgṛhyamāṇāyāṃ dhāryamāṇāyāṃ vācyamānāyāṃ paryavāpyamānāyāṃ pravartyamānāyāṃ deśyamānāyāmupadiśyamānāyāmuddiśyamānāyāṃ svādhyāyyamānāyāṃ likhyamānāyāṃ ca māraḥ pāpīyān bahuprakāramautsukyamāpatsyate,
566:278: bhagavānāha-kiṃcāpi subhūte māraḥ pāpīyānudyogamāpatsyate antarāyakarmaṇaḥ asyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāmudgṛhyamāṇāyāṃ dhāryamāṇāyāṃ vācyamānāyāṃ paryavāpyamānāyāṃ pravartyamānāyāṃ deśyamānāyāmupadiśyamānāyāmuddiśyamānāyāṃ svādhyāyyamānāyāṃ likhyamānāyāṃ ca,
566:279: atha ca punarna prasahiṣyate'cchidrasamādānasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyāntarāyaṃ kartum||
566:280: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantametadavocat-yadā bhagavan imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmudgṛhṇatāṃ dhārayatāṃ vācayatāṃ paryavāpnuvatāṃ pravartayatāṃ deśayatāmupadiśatāmuddiśatāṃ svādhyāyatāṃ likhatāṃ ca kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṝṇāṃ ca māraḥ pāpīyānautsukyamāpatsyate antarāyakaraṇāya,
566:281: tadā kathametarhi bhagavan kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraśca imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmudgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti pravartayiṣyanti deśayiṣyantyupadekṣyantyuddekṣyanti svādhyāsyanti likhiṣyanti ca?
566:282: kasya cānubhāvena bhagavaṃste kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraśca imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmudgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti pravartayiṣyanti deśayiṣyantyupadekṣyantyuddekṣyanti svādhyāsyanti likhiṣyanti ca?
566:283: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ śāriputrametadavocat-buddhānāṃ śāriputra bhagavatāṃ tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāmanubhāvena te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraśca imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmudgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti pravartayiṣyanti deśayiṣyantyupadekṣyantyuddekṣyanti svādhyāsyanti likhiṣyanti ca,
566:289: ye te'prameyeṣvasaṃkhyeyeṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavantastiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti,
566:290: te imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ samanvāhariṣyanti parigrahīṣyanti bhāṣyamāṇāmudgṛhyamāṇāṃ dhāryamāṇāṃ vācyamānāṃ paryavāpyamānāṃ pravartyamānāṃ deśyamānāmupadiśyamānāmuddiśyamānāṃ svādhyāyyamānāṃ likhyamānāṃ ca|
566:291: ye caināṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraścodgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti pravartayiṣyanti deśayiṣyantyupadekṣyantyuddekṣyanti svādhyāsyanti ca,
566:295: tāṃśca te buddhā bhagavantaḥ samanvāhariṣyanti parigrahīṣyanti ca|
566:296: na hi śāriputra buddhasamanvāhṛtānāṃ buddhaparigṛhītānāṃ ca kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṝṇāṃ ca śakyamantarāyaṃ kartum||
566:297: evamukte āyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantametadavocat-ye'pi te bhagavan bodhisattvā mahāsattvā imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ śroṣyanti udgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti pravartayiṣyanti deśayiṣyantyupadekṣyantyuddekṣyanti svādhyāsyanti likhiṣyanti ca,
566:301: sarve te bhagavan buddhānubhāvena buddhādhiṣṭhānena buddhaparigraheṇa ca imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ śroṣyanti udgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti pravartayiṣyanti deśayiṣyantyupadekṣyantyuddekṣyanti svādhyāsyanti likhiṣyanti ca,
566:307: sarve te śāriputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvā buddhānubhāvena buddhādhiṣṭhānena buddhaparigraheṇa ca imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ śroṣyanti udgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti pravartayiṣyanti deśayiṣyantyupadekṣyantyuddekṣyanti svādhyāsyanti likhiṣyanti ca,
566:315: ye te bodhisattvā mahāsattvā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ śroṣyanti udgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti pravartayiṣyanti deśayiṣyantyupadekṣyantyuddekṣyanti svādhyāsyanti likhiṣyanti ca,
566:319: śrutvo udgṛhya dhārayitvā vācayitvā paryavāpya pravartya deśayitvopadiśyoddiśya svādhyāyya likhitvā tathatvāya śikṣamāṇāstathatvāya pratipadyamānāstathatvāya yogamāpadyamānā āsannībhaviṣyantyanuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ,
566:321: ye'pi śāriputra enāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhitvā dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti deśayiṣyantyupadekṣyantyuddekṣyanti svādhyāsyanti likhiṣyanti,
566:325: te na tathatvāya śikṣamāṇā na tathatvāya pratipadyamānā na tathatvāya yogamāpadyamānā na tathatāyāṃ sthāsyantyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,
566:330: teṣāmapi śāriputra mahārthiko mahānuśaṃso mahāphalo mahāvipākaśca sa pariśramaḥ parispandaśca bhaviṣyati|
566:332: tathā hi prajñāpāramitā paramārthopasaṃhitā sarvadharmāṇāṃ yathābhūtaprativedhāya pratyupasthitā sarvasattvānām|
566:333: ime khalu punaḥ śāriputra ṣaṭpāramitāpratisaṃyuktāḥ sūtrāntāstathāgatasyātyayena dakṣiṇāpathe pracariṣyanti,
566:336: navamaṇḍaprāpte dharmavinaye saddharmasyāntardhānakālasamaye samanvāhṛtāste śāriputra tathāgatena kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraśca|
566:337: tasmin kāle ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmudgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti,
566:344: śāriputra āha-iyamapi bhagavan prajñāpāramitā evaṃgambhīrā paścime kāle paścime samaye vaistārikī bhaviṣyatyuttarasyāṃ diśi uttare digbhāge?
566:345: bhagavānāha-ye tatra śāriputra uttarasyāṃ diśyuttare digbhāge imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ śrutvā atra prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yogamāpatsyante,
566:348: ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ śroṣyanti likhiṣyanti udgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti pravartayiṣyanti deśayiṣyantyupadekṣyantyuddekṣyanti svādhyāsyanti,
566:352: śāriputra āha-kiyantaste bhagavan bodhisattvā mahāsattvā bhaviṣyanti uttarasyāṃ diśi uttare digbhāge,
566:354: ya imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ śroṣyanti likhiṣyanti udgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti pravartayiṣyanti deśayiṣyanti upadekṣyantyuddekṣyanti svādhyāsyanti,
566:358: bhagavānāha-bahavaste śāriputra subahavaḥ uttarāpathe uttarasyāṃ diśyuttare digbhāge bodhisattvā mahāsattvā bhaviṣyanti|
566:361: ya imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ śroṣyanti likhiṣyantyudgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti pravartayiṣyanti deśayiṣyanti upadekṣyantyuddekṣyanti svādhyāsyanti,
566:365: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ ca bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ nāvaleṣyante na saṃleṣyante,
566:373: pūjitāśca taiḥ paurvakāstathāgatā arhanta samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ kulaputraiḥ kuladuhitṛbhiśca bodhisattvayānikaiḥ pudgalaiḥ|
566:378: tathā hi teṣāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṝṇāṃ ca mayaiva sarvajñatāpratisaṃyuktaiva kathā kṛtā|
566:379: teṣāṃ jātivyativṛttānāmapi eta eva sarvajñatāpratisaṃyuktāḥ prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktāḥ samudācārā bhaviṣyanti|
566:383: teṣu ca susthitāḥ samāhitāśca bhaviṣyanti asyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyām|
566:389: te ca kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraśca śrutvā enāṃ prajñāpāramitāmudāraṃ prītiprāmodyaprasādaṃ pratilapsyante|
566:390: bahujanasya ca te kuśalamūlānyavaropayiṣyanti yadutānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau|
566:392: evaṃ hi taiḥ kulaputraiḥ kuladuhitṛbhiśca mamāntike saṃmukhaṃ vāgbhāṣitā-bahūni prāṇiśatāni bahūni prāṇisahasrāṇi bahūni prāṇiśatasahasrāṇi bahūni prāṇikoṭīśatāni bahūni prāṇikoṭīsahasrāṇi bahūni prāṇikoṭīśatasahasrāṇi bahūni prāṇikoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi bodhisattvacaryāṃ caranto vayamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau prasthāpayiṣyāmaḥ saṃdarśayiṣyāmaḥ samādāpayiṣyāmaḥ samuttejayiṣyāmaḥ saṃpraharṣayiṣyāmaḥ saṃprabhāvayiṣyāmaḥ saṃbodhaye pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāma iti,
566:395: anumoditaṃ hi śāriputra mayā teṣāṃ bodhisattvayānikānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṝṇāṃ ca cittena cittaṃ vyavalokya yairiyaṃ vāgbhāṣitā-bodhāya caranto vayaṃ bahūni prāṇiśatāni bahūni prāṇisahasrāṇi bahūni prāṇiśatasahasrāṇi bahūni prāṇikoṭīśatāni bahūni prāṇikoṭīsahasrāṇi bahūni prāṇikoṭīśatasahasrāṇi bahūni prāṇikoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau prasthāpayiṣyāmaḥ saṃdarśayiṣyāmaḥ samādāpayiṣyāmaḥ samuttejayiṣyāmaḥ saṃpraharṣayiṣyāmaḥ saṃprabhāvayiṣyāmaḥ,
566:398: evaṃ ca te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraśca udārādhimuktikā bhaviṣyanti,
566:400: yatra saṃmukhībhūtāstathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā dharmaṃ deśayiṣyanti,
566:401: tatra saṃmukhībhūtānāṃ tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāmantikātpunarevaināṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ vistareṇa śroṣyanti|
566:402: teṣvapi te buddhakṣetreṣu bahūni prāṇiśatāni bahūni prāṇisahasrāṇi bahūni prāṇiśatasahasrāṇi bahūni prāṇikoṭīśatāni bahūni prāṇikoṭīsahasrāṇi bahūni prāṇikoṭīśatasahasrāṇi bahūni prāṇikoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau prasthāpayiṣyanti saṃdarśayiṣyanti samādāpayiṣyanti samuttejayiṣyanti saṃpraharṣayiṣyanti saṃprabhāvayiṣyanti,
566:405: evamukte āyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantametadavocat-āścaryaṃ bhagavan yāvadidaṃ tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena atītānāgatapratyutpanneṣu dharmeṣu nāsti kiṃcidadṛṣṭaṃ vā aśrutaṃ vā aviditaṃ vā avijñātaṃ vā|
566:406: na sa kaściddharmo yo na jñāto na sa kāciccaryā sattvānāṃ yā na vijñātā,
566:407: yatra hi nāma anāgatānāmapi bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ caryāṃ jñātā bodhicchandikānāmadhyāśayasaṃpannānāmārabdhavīryāṇām|
566:408: ye tasmin kāle imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāmudgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti pravartayiṣyanti deśayiṣyanti upadekṣyantyuddekṣyanti svādhyāsyanti likhiṣyanti ca,
566:409: ye ca tasmin kāle āsāṃ ṣaṇṇāṃ pāramitānāṃ kṛtaśaḥ sarvasattvānāmarthāya udyogamāpadya anveṣiṣyante paryeṣiṣyante,
566:411: teṣāṃ ca kulaputrānāṃ kṛladuhitṝṇāṃ ca anveṣamāṇānāṃ paryeṣamāṇānāṃ kecidgaveṣamāṇā bodhisattvā lapsyante,
566:416: nāsti kiṃcittathāgatasya atītānāgatapratyutpanneṣu dharmeṣvadṛṣṭaṃ vā aśrutaṃ vā aviditaṃ vā avijñātaṃ vā|
566:417: tasmin khalu punaḥ śāriputra kāle tasmin samaye kecidbodhisattvā mārgayamāṇā paryeṣamāṇā gaveṣamāṇā api lapsyante imāṃ prajñāpāramitām|
566:420: tathā hi tairbodhisattvairmahāsattvairiyaṃ prajñāpāramitā pūrvāntato'pi anikṣiptadhurairmārgitā ca paryanviṣṭā ca|
566:421: te tenaiva pūrvakeṇa kuśalamūlacchandena enāṃ prajñāpāramitāmamārgayanto'pi aparyeṣamāṇā api agaveṣayanto'pi lapsyante|
566:422: yānyapi ca tato'nyānyapi sūtrāṇi enāmeva prajñāpāramitāmabhivadanti,
566:423: tāni caiṣāṃ svayamevopagamiṣyanti upapatsyante upanaṃsyante ca|
566:425: evametacchāriputra bhavati-ya enāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo'nikṣiptadhuro mārgayati ca paryeṣate ca,
566:426: sa jātivyativṛtto'pi janmāntaravyativṛtto'pi enāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ lapsyate|
566:427: tato'nyāni ca sūtrāṇi prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktāni tasya svayamevopagamiṣyanti,
566:429: evamukte āyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantametadavocat-ime eva kevalaṃ bhagavaṃsteṣāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṝṇāṃ ca ṣaṭpāramitāpratisaṃyuktāḥ sūtrāntā upapatsyante upanaṃsyante, nānye?
566:430: bhagavānāha-ye cānye'pi śāriputra gambhīrā gambhīrāḥ sūtrāntā bhaviṣyanti,
566:431: te'pi teṣāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṝṇāṃ ca svayamevopapatsyante svayamevopanaṃsyante ca|
566:433: evaṃ hyetacchāriputra bhavati-ye bodhisattvā mahāsattvā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau prasthāpayiṣyanti saṃdarśayiṣyanti samādāpayiṣyanti samuttejayiṣyanti saṃpraharṣayiṣyanti prabhāvayiṣyanti,
566:437: teṣāṃ śāriputra jātivyativṛttānāmapi ime gambhīrā gambhīrā anupalambhapratisaṃyuktāḥ śūnyatāpratisaṃyuktāḥ ṣaṭpāramitāpratisaṃyuktāśca sūtrāntāḥ svayamevopagamiṣyanti,
